mapper.update: update Board_Table set b_hit = b_hit +1 where board_num = #{board_num}
update Board_Table set b_title = #{b_title}, b_content = #{b_content}, b_file_name = #{b_file_name}, b_file_path = #{b_file_path} where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: select * from Board_Table order by board_num desc limit ${skip}, ${size}
select ct.*, mt.m_name as c_writer from Comment_Table ct join Member_Table mt on ct.c_member_num = mt.m_number where c_num=#{baord_num} and c_kind='1' order by Comment_num desc limit ${skip}, ${size}
select count(*) from Comment_Table where c_num=#{baord_num} and c_kind='1'
mapper.insert: insert into Comment_Table (c_num, c_member_num, c_kind, c_content, c_date, c_pro) values(#{c_num}, #{c_member_num}, #{c_kind}, #{c_content}, #{c_date}, #{c_pro})
